column2: Dedicated in 1987 by Spanish King and Queen
column3: A regal depiction in a great sculpture is a centrepiece of the lovely Plaza. Carlos III reigned from 1759 to 1788 and he ordered the founding of the Pueblo in 1781.The monument honoured the bicentenary of American Independence in 1976. In 1987 it was dedicated by the then Spanish King and Queen.
